title: Magic Missile
content:
Magic Missile can be cast by using the following Items: The Sapphire Spark Ne'er Misser

Sorcerer, Wizard, Arcane Trickster, Eldritch Knight

The Sapphire Spark Ne'er Misser

Magic Missile Tips & Notes

Upcast: When cast at 2nd Level or higher, an additional dart is gained for every additional level; potentially allowing for 8 darts if Upcast to the 6th Level. This spell always hits it's target, even if the caster does not have a line of sight to it. Each missile projectile will trigger a Concen
